page.title: 13MUMS SHOPPING
page.content: Mum travels 5 miles 3 times a week by car to shop in Macclesfield. Saturday and Tuesday are to get odds and ends but Thursday is the big shopping day. First we have to wait about 15 minutes for a parking space then we pay 15p for a parking ticket.In the supermarket we get our trolley and go round the store collecting our groceries. We buy low fat milk and cheese for my brother. When we have got everything we pay at the check out and then pack all the shopping in our car. Then we go into the sports shop to get special weight lifting gloves and then to the news agents to get a Hells Angels magazine for my brother. On our way home we have to buy some petrol at the garage we call at the village shop for the television papers and stamps.
